    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Specified by:
        getName in interface Strategy
        Returns:
        name returns the name

      • determineMove

        public int determineMove(Board b,
                         Mark m)
        Calculates and returns the best move using a thread for every possible move. each thread calculates the value of the move using alphabeta then the move with the best value is chosen
        Specified by:
        determineMove in interface Strategy
        Parameters:
        board - the current state of the board
        mark - the mark of the player

      • alphaBeta

        public int alphaBeta(Board b,
                     Mark m,
                     int alpha,
                     int beta,
                     int depthz,
                     boolean myTurn)
        Calculates and returns the value the move based on the assumption that you will always take the best move and the enemy the worst move for you this is calculated with alphabeta pruning.
        Parameters:
        board - the state of the board
        mark - the mark of the player
        alpha - the alpha value in the alphabeta pruning
        beta - the beta value in the alphabeta pruning
        depthz - the depth is how many moves you are looking ahead of the current game
        myTurn - is it my turn or my enemy's turn

      • evaluate

        public int evaluate(Mark mark,
                    int depths,
                    Board board)
        Calculates and returns the value of the board for mark first it looks if a player has won. then it gives adds a score based on how close to the middle the marks are, and if there are any row with only one player's marks after that a score is added based on amount of winning moves for you/your opponent
        Parameters:
        mark - Mark that is used by the player
        depths - the depth is how many moves you are looking ahead of the current game
        board - the board situation

      • getImportantFields

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> getImportantFields(Mark mark,
                                                                             Board b)
        Calculates and returns a map with the height/width of a field, the fields it returns are empty but would win the game for this mark.
        Parameters:
        mark - Mark that is used by the player
        board - the board situation
